events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred last night involving their vehicle and a pole on the side of the road.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords related to car collision found in the initial report.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to the case to ensure thorough handling and quick settlement.
Acknowledgement of claim receipt was sent to the customer confirming the start of the claims process.
Requested copies of the police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the collision damage from the insured.
Received the complete set of requested documents including police report and multiple images showing the extent of the collision damage.
Investigation initiated to verify accident details and assess liability and repair estimates based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming vehicle damage consistent with the collision and no indications of fault by the insured driver.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover full repair costs and related expenses documented in the investigation report.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the quick and transparent handling.
The claim approval was finalized confirming the agreed settlement amount and authorizing payment issuance.
Payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account covering the total approved settlement amount.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the customer received payment and had no further questions.
All claim documentation and correspondence were archived as per company policy for any future reference.
